text: Love Affair is a 1939 American romance movie. It was directed by Leo McCarey. The movie stars Irene Dunne, Charles Boyer, Maria Ouspenskaya, Lee Bowman, Astrid Allwyn and Maurice Moscovitch. It was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. The movie was nominated for 6 Academy Awards in 1940. It was remade as An Affair to Remember in 1957 and Love Affair in 1994. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1939 movies Category:1930s romance movies Category:1930s American romance movies Category:Movies directed by Leo McCarey
title: Love Affair (1939 movie)
